title: Organic food maker Hain revamps board in win for activist investor

content: Aug 16 Hain Celestial Group Inc's  shares fell 30 percent to their lowest in five months in early trading after the organic food maker said it had started an internal probe into its accounting practices and would not meet its full-year forecasts.
name: The Hain Celestial Group Inc
title: Hain Celestial shares sink on news of internal accounting probe

content: Oct 19 Stremicks Heritage Foods LLC  a U.S. maker and distributor of dairy products  is exploring a sale that it hopes could value it at more than $1 billion  including debt  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: The Hain Celestial Group Inc
title: Stremicks Heritage Foods seeks sale-sources

content: Hain Celestial Group Inc failed to persuade a federal judge to dismiss a lawsuit accusing it of deceiving consumers into overpaying for its Earth's Best baby food  infant food and baby and home care products by falsely labeling them "organic" or "all natural."
name: The Hain Celestial Group Inc
title: Hain Celestial must face lawsuit over baby-food labeling
